title: Clickable dish images with enlarged-image modal in Customer Portal

requirements.summary: Replace emoji-only dish visuals with real static dish images for the six sample menu items in the Customer Portal Food Menu grid.
acceptanceCriteria: Each item in the Customer Portal "Food Menu" grid displays a real image loaded from a local static file (not an emoji).
Images are stored and served as static assets from the frontend (no backend involvement).
All six sample menu items (Pizza, Burger, Biryani, Pasta, Sandwich, Noodles) have corresponding images and render correctly on mobile and desktop.

file_operations.description: Add the generated static asset image for Pizza at frontend/public/assets/generated/dish-pizza.dim_512x512.png.
Add the generated static asset image for Burger at frontend/public/assets/generated/dish-burger.dim_512x512.png.
Add the generated static asset image for Biryani at frontend/public/assets/generated/dish-biryani.dim_512x512.png.
Add the generated static asset image for Pasta at frontend/public/assets/generated/dish-pasta.dim_512x512.png.
Add the generated static asset image for Sandwich at frontend/public/assets/generated/dish-sandwich.dim_512x512.png.
Add the generated static asset image for Noodles at frontend/public/assets/generated/dish-noodles.dim_512x512.png.

Update the Food Menu grid card UI to render dish images as (sourced from the new static assets) with responsive sizing/cropping, replacing the current emoji-only rendering, while keeping the existing layout and "Order Now" action intact.

requirements.summary: Make dish images clickable to open a dismissible modal showing a larger version of the same dish image without affecting existing Order Now behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking/tapping a dish image in the Customer Portal "Food Menu" opens a modal/popup displaying a larger version of the same dish image.
The modal includes a clear close mechanism (e.g., close button and/or clicking outside and/or Escape key) and returns focus appropriately when closed.
The existing "Order Now" button still selects the item for the order form and continues to show the existing toast feedback.
No backend changes are introduced; this remains UI-only behavior.

file_operations.description: Create a reusable, accessible dish image modal component (overlay + larger image + close button) that supports dismiss via close button, backdrop click, and Escape key, and returns focus to the previously focused trigger element when closed.

Wire dish image clicks in the Food Menu grid to open DishImageModal with the correct dish image; ensure modal dismissal works (close/backdrop/Escape + focus return) and ensure the existing "Order Now" button behavior/toast remains unchanged.

requirements.summary: Update the Customer Portal menu data model to reference static image filenames and wire UI to use them with English alt text matching dish names.
acceptanceCriteria: sampleMenuItems in frontend/src/pages/CustomerPortal.tsx references image file paths for each dish image.
Rendered elements have English alt text matching the dish name (e.g., "Pizza", "Burger").
No user-facing text added by this change is non-English.

file_operations.description: Refactor sampleMenuItems so each item includes a static image path referencing the generated assets (frontend/public/assets/generated/dish-pizza.dim_512x512.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/dish-burger.dim_512x512.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/dish-biryani.dim_512x512.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/dish-pasta.dim_512x512.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/dish-sandwich.dim_512x512.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/dish-noodles.dim_512x512.png), and ensure all rendered dish tags use English alt text equal to the dish name.
